name: Gravity Series
description:
Gravity Series is a collection of 7 gravity-themed local multiplayer games + 2 metagames (3 if you include the new infinite mode).

  • 2-4 players (controllers recommended but not required).
  • Realtime synthesized audio.
  • Custom tournaments.

These games were originally made for the makega.me 'Series' pageant. You can read the devlog here.
